Html:
Hello, I downloaded the file, added rateit.css in my css file folder; added in my head :
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://mysite.com/css/rateit.css" media="screen" />
Added jquery.rateit.js files; jquery.rateit.min.js and jquery.rateit.min.js.map in my js folder. I added in my body :
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery.rateit.js"></script>
And I added the star image and delete my pictures folder.

And finally, I added in my footer or in my body, but it does not appear ..
<div class="rateit" data-rateit-value="2.5" data-rateit-ispreset="true" data-rateit-readonly="true"></div>
Thank for help..
It' s ok, I forgot to change the path of the images in the css ;)
